SEARCH
Package cmpt213.assignment.importantdaystracker.model

Class ImportantDay

java.lang.Object
cmpt213.assignment.importantdaystracker.model.ImportantDay
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<ImportantDay>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Anniversary, Birthday, Occasion
public abstract class ImportantDay extends Object implements Comparable<ImportantDay>
An abstract base class representing an important day with common fields: name, date, and description.

This class is extended by specific types of important days like Birthday, Anniversary, and Occasion, and is configured for use with JSON polymorphic deserialization.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
